org.jsimpledb.kv.simple

Class SimpleKVDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsimpledb.kv.simple.SimpleKVDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KVDatabase
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XMLKVDatabase

    public class SimpleKVDatabase
extends Object
implements KVDatabase
    Simple implementation of the KVDatabase interface that provides a concurrent, transactional view of an underlying KVStore with full isolation and serializable semantics. The latter properties are provided by a LockManager.

    Instances wrap an underlying KVStore, from which committed data is read and written. During a transaction, all mutations are recorded internally; if/when the transaction is committed, the mutations are applied to the underlying KVStore. This operation is bracketed by calls to preCommit() and postCommit().

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleKVDatabase

        public SimpleKVDatabase()
        Constructor. Uses an internal in-memory KVStore.

      • SimpleKVDatabase

        public SimpleKVDatabase(KVStore kv)
        Constructor taking caller-supplied storage.
        Parameters:
        kv - KVStore for the committed data
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if kv is null

      • SimpleKVDatabase

        public SimpleKVDatabase(long waitTimeout,
                long holdTimeout)
        Constructor taking timeout settings. Uses an internal in-memory KVStore.
        Parameters:
        waitTimeout - how long a thread will wait for a lock before throwing RetryTransactionException in milliseconds, or zero for unlimited
        holdTimeout - how long a thread may hold a contestested lock before throwing RetryTransactionException in milliseconds, or zero for unlimited
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if waitTimeout or holdTimeout is negative

      • SimpleKVDatabase

        public SimpleKVDatabase(KVStore kv,
                long waitTimeout,
                long holdTimeout)
        Constructor taking (optional) caller-supplied storage and timeout settings.
        Parameters:
        kv - KVStore for the committed data, or null for an in-memory KVStore
        waitTimeout - how long a thread will wait for a lock before throwing RetryTransactionException in milliseconds, or zero for unlimited
        holdTimeout - how long a thread may hold a contestested lock before throwing RetryTransactionException in milliseconds, or zero for unlimited
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if waitTimeout or holdTimeout is negative

    • Method Detail

      • getWaitTimeout

        public long getWaitTimeout()
        Get the default wait timeout for new transactions for this instance.

        The wait timeout limits how long a thread will wait for a contested lock before giving up and throwing RetryTransactionException.

        Returns:
        wait timeout in milliseconds

      • setWaitTimeout

        public void setWaitTimeout(long waitTimeout)
        Set the default wait timeout for new transactions for this instance. Default is zero (unlimited).
        Parameters:
        waitTimeout - how long a thread will wait for a lock before throwing RetryTransactionException in milliseconds (default), or zero for unlimited
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if waitTimeout is negative

      • getHoldTimeout

        public long getHoldTimeout()
        Get the hold timeout configured for this instance.

        The hold timeout limits how long a thread may hold on to a contested lock before being forced to release all of its locks; after that, the next attempted operation will fail with RetryTransactionException.

        Returns:
        hold timeout in milliseconds

      • setHoldTimeout

        public void setHoldTimeout(long holdTimeout)
        Set the hold timeout for this instance. Default is zero (unlimited).
        Parameters:
        holdTimeout - how long a thread may hold a contestested lock before throwing RetryTransactionException in milliseconds, or zero for unlimited
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if holdTimeout is negative

      • createTransaction

        public KVTransaction createTransaction()
        Description copied from interface: KVDatabase
        Create a new transaction.
        Specified by:
        createTransaction in interface KVDatabase

      • preCommit

        protected void preCommit(KVStore kv)
        Invoked during transaction commit just prior to writing changes to the underlying KVStore.

        SimpleKVDatabase guarantees this method and postCommit() will be invoked in matching pairs.

        The implementation in SimpleKVDatabase does nothing.

        Parameters:
        kv - underlying data store for committed data

      • postCommit

        protected void postCommit(KVStore kv,
              boolean successful)
        Invoked during transaction commit just after writing changes to the underlying KVStore.

        SimpleKVDatabase guarantees this method and preCommit() will be invoked in matching pairs. This method is invoked even if the underlying KVStore throws an exception while changes were being written to it. In that case, successful will be false.

        The implementation in SimpleKVDatabase does nothing.

        Parameters:
        kv - underlying data store for committed data
        successful - true if all changes were written back successfully, false if the underlying KVStore threw an exception
